meanings.definition: A person who assigns tasks or responsibilities to others.
meanings.sent1: The assigners in the office always make sure everyone has something to do.
meanings.sent2: The assigners handed out the new projects to each team member.
meanings.sent3: The assigners decided to give the office dog the important task of guarding the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The assigners were like conductors, orchestrating the work of the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The assigners were like puzzle masters, fitting each task to the right person perfectly.

meanings.definition: Those who allocate or designate something to a particular person or group.
meanings.sent1: The assigners carefully distributed the supplies to each department.
meanings.sent2: The assigners at the event ensured that every guest had a seat.
meanings.sent3: The assigners decided to assign the task of choosing the music playlist to a coin flip.
meanings.sent4: The assigners were like traffic controllers, directing resources to where they were needed most.
meanings.sent5: The assigners were like fairy godmothers, granting wishes to different teams with a wave of their hands.
